net.proteusframework.cms

Class CmsValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • net.proteusframework.core.lang.InternationalizedException
            • net.proteusframework.core.lang.ValidationException
              • net.proteusframework.cms.CmsException
                • net.proteusframework.cms.CmsValidationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable, ConfigurableObject

    public class CmsValidationException
extends CmsException
    Validation Exception. Usually thrown by DAOs to signify that data could not be modified due to a validation error. APIs should provide functionality to validate prior to an attempt to save.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
